info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 1:04PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Hillsdale County through 130 PM EDT... At 104 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Litchfield, or 12 miles northwest of Hillsdale, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jonesville and Hillsdale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
